entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
